body:
The NASDAQ 100 After Hours Indicator is up 4.28 to 5,156.97. The total After hours volume is currently 47,904,385 shares traded.

The consensus earnings per share forecast is 1.24 per share, which represents a 139 percent increase over the EPS one Year AgoGeneral Electric Company ( GE ) is -0.02 at $29.67, with 2,519,652 shares traded. The consensus EPS forecast is $1.85. , following a 52-week high recorded in today's regular session.Abbott Laboratories ( ABT ) is unchanged at $42.33, with 1,062,372 shares traded. Over the last four weeks they have had 4 up revisions for the earnings forecast, for the fiscal quarter ending Sep 2017. The consensus EPS forecast is $0.68. title: After Hours Most Active for Feb 1, 2017 : FB, LOGM, TGI, GE, QQQ, PFE, WFT, BIVVV, CSCO, AAPL, ABT, SYF
